topic.title: Acute Hepatitis BPHCR Treatment Information Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Treatment Information Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.4)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Acute Hepatitis B Therapeutic Regimen Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.23)
SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Treatment Information Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55753-8" Treatment Information (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:663)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Treatment Information" (CONF:664)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Acute Hepatitis B Therapeutic Regimen Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.23)

p.ph: Acute Hepatitis BPHCR Treatment Information Section
